tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE maintenance_tasks (
  task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  task_description TEXT,
  frequency_interval INT,
  last_completed_date DATE,
  next_due_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT,
    task_name VARCHAR,
    frequency INTERVAL,
    start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  building_id UUID NOT NULL,
  task_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  scheduled_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Building (
  building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  building_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  construction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  building_id INT,
  schedule_date DATE,
  task_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (building_id) REFERENCES Building(building_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceTasks (
  task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR(255),
  task_duration INTERVAL,
  task_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE TaskAssignments (
  assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_id INT,
  task_id INT,
  assignment_date DATE,
  assignment_status VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (schedule_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceSchedule(schedule_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceTasks(task_id)
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    building_id INT,
    task_name VARCHAR(50),
    task_description TEXT,
    schedule_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id INT,
    task_id INT,
    completion_date DATE,
    remarks TEXT
);
